com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.dialogs.views

Interface DefaultButtonView

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CancableView, DefaultView, HasDialogCloseButton
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    ColorPresenter.ColorView, ContextMenuPositionPresenter.ContextMenuPositionView, CorrectionPresenter.CorrectionView, KeyWordsPresenter.KeyWordsView, MessageBoxPresenter.MessageBoxView, OptionPresenter.OptionView, ResultPresenter.ResultView, ServerPresenter.ServerView
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ColorDialog, ColorDialog, ContextMenuPositionDialog, ContextMenuPositionDialog, CorrectionDialog, CorrectionDialog, KeyWordsDialog, KeyWordsDialog, MessageBoxDialog, MessageBoxDialog, OptionDialog, OptionDialog, ResultDialog, ResultDialog, ServerDialog, ServerDialog

    public interface DefaultButtonView
extends DefaultView, CancableView, HasDialogCloseButton
    The interface DefaultButtonView is used by views supporting all default buttons. Note: If you must implement this interface but have no button you could use a MemoryButtonHandler.
